trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<reference>" name="<reference>" href=""></xref> element of an XML signature.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<reference>" name="<reference>" href=""> </xref> elemento de uma assinatura de XML.

trans-unit.source: The Reference object represents the <`reference`> element of an XML digital signature defined by the XML digital signature specification.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de referência que representa o `reference`> elemento de uma assinatura digital XML definido pela especificação de assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: Use the Reference object to specify the following information: - The digest algorithm used to sign of the data object.
trans-unit.target: Use o objeto de referência para especificar as seguintes informações:-o algoritmo digest usado para fazer logon do objeto de dados.

trans-unit.source: This value is required.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é necessário.

trans-unit.source: - The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the data object to sign.
trans-unit.target: -O identificador de URI (Uniform Resource) do objeto de dados para entrar.

trans-unit.source: The URI can specify a file path or specific elements within an XML document.
trans-unit.target: O URI pode especificar um caminho de arquivo ou elementos específicos dentro de um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: This value is required.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é necessário.

trans-unit.source: - A chain of transforms to apply before generating the digest.
trans-unit.target: -Uma cadeia de transformações para aplicar antes de gerar o resumo.

trans-unit.source: This value is optional.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é opcional.

trans-unit.source: - The type of object to sign.
trans-unit.target: -O tipo de objeto para entrar.

trans-unit.source: This value is optional.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é opcional.

trans-unit.source: - A unique identifier used to reference the current `<reference>` element.
trans-unit.target: -Um identificador exclusivo usado para fazer referência atual `<reference>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: This value is optional.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é opcional.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <`reference`> element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `reference`> elemento, consulte o W3C especificação em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref> classe com propriedades padrão.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref> class with a hash value of the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref> classe com um valor de hash de <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> especificado

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> object to the hash value that corresponds to the `stream` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>o valor de hash que corresponde ao objeto de `stream` parâmetro.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> with which to initialize the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>com a qual inicializar a nova instância de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref> classe com o <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri> especificado

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> object to the data at the URI with special processing for `""`, `#xpointer(/)`, and `#xxxx`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>objeto para os dados no URI com processamento especial para `""`, `#xpointer(/)`, e `#xxxx`.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> with which to initialize the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>com a qual inicializar a nova instância de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object to the list of transforms to be performed on the data before passing it to the digest algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref> objeto à lista de transformações para ser executada nos dados antes de passar para o algoritmo digest.

trans-unit.source: The AddTransform method modifies the `<Transform>` element and associated subelements of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: O método AddTransform modifica o `<Transform>` elemento e subelementos associados de uma assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: Transforms are applied in the order in which they were added.
trans-unit.target: São aplicadas na ordem na qual eles foram adicionados.

trans-unit.source: If no transforms are specified, the minimum required transforms are added automatically.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum transformações forem especificadas, o requisito mínimo de transformações são adicionadas automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais XML, consulte a especificação do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The transform to be added to the list of transforms.
trans-unit.target: A transformação a ser adicionado à lista de transformações.

trans-unit.source: The transform parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The transform parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the digest method Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o identificador de URI (Uniform Resource) do atual do método digest <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DigestMethod property uses a URI string to represent the <`DigestMethod`> element of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DigestMethod usa uma cadeia de caracteres do URI para representar o `DigestMethod`> elemento de uma assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: The digest method is the algorithm used to hash the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>.
trans-unit.target: O método digest é o algoritmo usado para hash <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>

trans-unit.source: The default algorithm is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo padrão é <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais XML, consulte a especificação do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The digest method URI of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O método digest URI do atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is "http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#sha1".
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é "http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#sha1".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the digest value of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do resumo do atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DigestValue property uses an array of bytes to represent the <`DigestValue`> element of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DigestValue usa uma matriz de bytes para representar o `DigestValue`> elemento de uma assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: The DigestValue property contains the Base 64 encoded value of the digest of the object described by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.Uri%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DigestValue contém o valor de codificada em Base 64 do resumo do objeto descrito pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.Uri%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DigestValue property is automatically populated with the appropriate value whenever you make a call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.ComputeSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DigestValue é preenchida automaticamente com o valor apropriado sempre que você fizer uma chamada para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.ComputeSignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.ComputeSignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais XML, consulte a especificação do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The digest value of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor do resumo do atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação XML do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A representação XML do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.DigestMethod*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.DigestValue*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ID da atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the Id property to add a string ID to the XML representation of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> element.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Id para adicionar uma ID de cadeia de caracteres para a representação XML do atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>elemento.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>

trans-unit.source: The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference> element from another location.
trans-unit.target: A ID é usada como referência a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>elemento de outro local.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A ID da atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref> state from an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Carrega um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref> estado de um elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: The XML element from which to load the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML do qual carregar o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref> estado.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The value parameter does not contain any transforms.
trans-unit.target: O value parâmetro não contém quaisquer transformações.

trans-unit.source: -or- The value parameter contains an unknown transform.
trans-unit.target: - ou - value parâmetro contém uma transformação desconhecida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the transform chain of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de transformação do atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TransformChain property represents the <`Transform`> element and associated subelements of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: TransformChain propriedade representa o `Transform`> elemento e subelementos associados de uma assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: The transform chain is an ordered list of transforms.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de transformação é uma lista ordenada de transformações.

trans-unit.source: The output of these transforms constitutes the input to the hash algorithm specified in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.DigestMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A saída dessas transformações constitui a entrada para o algoritmo de hash especificado no <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.DigestMethod%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference.DigestMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais XML, consulte a especificação do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The transform chain of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de transformação do atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the object being signed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo do objeto que está sendo assinado.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object being signed.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto que está sendo assinado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Uri> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Uri>do atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>do atual <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Reference"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>
